attributes.action: make picking a nose illegal in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
picking your nose should be fined for 3 offences and jailed on 4th offence.

eating your bogey's should be an instant jailable offence

its a disgusting habit that needs to be stopped

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
